title: Josie Maran Escape To Morocco Holiday Hair & Body Beautifiers
features: A limited-edition set of Josie’s bestselling argan oil-infused products for face, hair, and body for head to toe hydration.
This set contains: 1.9 oz Argan Cleansing Oil, 0.5 oz Argan Oil Hair Serum,
0.5 oz Argan Infinity Intensive Creamy Oil, 0.5 oz 100% Pure Argan Oil,
1 oz Whipped Argan Oil Intensive Hand Cream in Vanilla Apricot &
2 oz Whipped Argan Oil Body Butter in Vanilla Apricot
description: For centuries, Moroccan women have used argan oil to cleanse and moisturize their skin. If you can't escape to Morocco for the holidays, you can still enjoy the wonders of the place with these six bestselling body care beautifiers, each infused with "the Moroccan miracle moisturizer"—100% Pure Argan Oil. The Argan Cleansing Oil features a blend of natural, good oils that dissolve bad oils, dirt, and makeup while the Infinity Intensive Creamy Oil starts as a cream and melts into an oil with infinite uses. The ultralight, never greasy hair serum moisturizes and seals split ends while the organic multitasking moisturizer, 100% Pure Argan Oil, is loaded with essential nutrients. The lightweight, luxurious hand cream and body butter are infused with a delicate vanilla apricot set and work to hydrate, soothe, and revitalize skin.
store: JOSIE MARAN Luxury with a conscience
